metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8920 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The _ar_read_header function in archive_read_support_format_ar.c in libarchive before 3.2.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds stack read) via a crafted ar file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8920` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.3
bsdtar - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.3
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-7ubuntu2.3').
